text: Activity 9 1) Integrate the wave-equation for a taut string of Length 𝐿 = 10 with 𝑐 = 1 and produce a heat map of 𝑦 𝑥, 𝑡 , for the string initially at rest with clamped boundary (𝑦 0, 𝑡 = 𝑦 𝐿, 𝑡 = 0) conditions and an initial displacement of a) 𝑦 𝑥, 0 = sin 2𝜋𝑥 10 + sin 𝜋𝑥 10 b) 𝑦 𝑥, 0 = 𝑒−4 𝑥−5 2
